resources.string: AOSiP stands for Android Open Source illusion Project. We are an AOSP based custom ROM, twisted with the latest features from all over the Android development community. Quality and stability is our first priority as we are dedicated to bringing you the best Android has to offer.
Otherwise known as XlxFoXxlX. N6/N6P/Flo maintainer.
AOSiP visionary, the man behind the owl logo/images.
Reset values to\nAndroid- or AOSiP default?
Reset colors to\nAndroid- or AOSiP default?
Lights in do not disturb mode
Adjust items like battery, clock, icons and colors
For better visibility on bright images
Adjust brightness by sliding across status bar
Abbreviated day of the week before the time
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Enables the statusbar clock in the keyguard on the left side
Enable to show the (custom) carrier label on the status bar
Enable to show the (custom) carrier label on the status bar of the lock screen
Enable to use a custom carrier label
Enter a new custom label to display instead of the real carrier name. An empty field will revert the name to \'AOSiP\'
Enable to choose a number of visible notification icons to hide the (custom) carrier label on the status bar
Enable to show the values in bit instead of byte
Enable to hide the indicator if there is no traffic
Enable to show the percentage text
The circle won\'t be shown dotted
Enable to cut the percentage-text/charging-indicator out of the battery icon, if the battery fill overlaps the percentage-text/charging-indicator.
Enable to show the charging animation
Percentage text & charging indicator (light status bar)
Navigation Bar options (Fling, Pulse, height, width, etc..)
Options such as Gesture Anywhere, 3 finger swipe, etc.
After selecting a target from below, swipe vertically with 3 fingers in a single motion from top to bottom to trigger the action you selected.
Manage your quick tiles and expanded statusbar
Change default tile count from 3 to 4 columns
Two main tiles on the first row
Three or four tiles on each row
Show a brightness slider in the quick settings panel
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Tweak the actions of your volume/power buttons and dialogs
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device
When the screen is off, long pressing the volume keys will seek music tracks
Bug reporting is disabled in development settings
Configure your clear all button and misc recent options
Enable immersive mode for recents screen
Include foreground task when clearing all
Show Google search bar in the recents screen
Show a bar with the device\'s available memory
Don\'t exclude the topmost task in recents view
Show recent apps panel on the left edge
Show app shortcuts on the other edge
Enable media cover art on the lockscreen
Options for Colors, Shortcuts, Weather and Wallpaper
Customize the shortcut icons in the corners
Choose an icon for displaying the weather condition
Choose when the weather panel should be hidden
The weather panel will be hidden when the visible notifications will reach the maximum allowed notifications on the lock screen
The weather panel will be hidden when the visible notifications will reach the chosen number of notifications
The weather panel won\`t be hidden
Open custom lock screen shortcuts on longpress
Maximum entries size has been reached
It is not possible to delete last entry
Disabled\nAdd an entry to enable this feature
The chosen app did not return a valid icon or does not support image cropping. Use another app.
The chosen action cannot be added twice
, while selecting the icon will bring up customization options

To add a %1$s, select the Add icon. Once a %1$s is added, selecting the row will change the target%2$s

To remove a %1$s, swipe the row horizontally left or right. Re-order a %1$s in the list by vertically dragging the anchor on the left.

To clear or reset to defaults, select the reset option.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the feature entirely.
Removing every %1$s in the list will disable the second pie layer entirely.
Lockscreen wallpaper set back to default
To add a custom per-app configuration for expanded state, set "Enabled for all" to the off position
Choose a default expanded desktop style
Change the enter/exit animation of the power menu
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion!
Place the navigation bar on the left side of the screen in landscape mode
Back and Home are required to be set at all times. To change a Back or Home assignment, set the desired assignment first
When only a right or left action is assigned, the action applies to the full bar
Fine tune long swipe thresholds based on a percentage of Fling interface width or height
Show a trail on swipe gestures
Increase or decrease the time it takes to execute a long press
Pulse is a brilliant audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar when music plays. Pulse does not work with some audio sources when listening on device speaker
Audio graphic equalizer on the navigation bar
Pulse animates a smooth lava lamp style color blend
Adjust The Dimensions of The Pulse bars in Visualizer with Custom Dimension Changer. Also Adjust The Spacing Between Them
Adjust The Size of Pulse Visualizer Blocks and Spacing Each Block
Adjust The Agression for Pulse Visualizer. Relaxed Being Smallest and Insanse Being Most Agressive
Medium press and drag to change position. Long press to show edit menu. Button position may be changed while menu is showing.
Set the position of contextual buttons such as menu and ime selector
Set the animation style of the primary buttons when they are pressed
Are you sure you want to reset Smartbar to stock settings?
Set what buttons to show when a on-screen keyboard is showing
Right edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Configure what icons are shown on status bar
Allow unlocked data access to your phone\'s storage through USB (MTP, PTP)

Your device will establish unprotected connections, everytime you connect it to a PC. Secured lockscreens disable this option automatically.\n\nThis is still an experimental feature, use with caution.
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
Prevent loud volume levels when headset is first plugged in
Listening at high volume for long periods may damage your hearing. Disable it with caution.
Limit the notification sounds of each app to only play once per set time period
Volume keys control media volume rather than notifications
Wake up device if charger is plugged/unplugged.

You don\'t have any blocked numbers. Add an entry by touching the Add (+) button.
To prevent phone numbers from calling or messaging you, enable the blocked caller list.
You will not receive incoming calls or messages from phone numbers on the blocked caller list
Don\'t block calls from private numbers
Don\'t block calls or messages from numbers not in the contact list
Block incoming %s from numbers not in the contact list
Use . as a wildcard and * for repetition. E.g. 123.* blocks numbers starting with 123 and .*123.* blocks numbers containing 123
Unable to add invalid phone number to blocked caller list
Do you want to remove this blocked phone number?
Change the number of columns displayed in the dashboard
Show dashboard tile titles in 2 lines
Could not load %s. Make sure you have storage available.
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical postion of the trigger area
Adjust the height of the trigger area
Show circle app launcher after touching right side of screen
Apps will show in app circle bar
Adjust the width of the trigger area
Adjust the vertical postion of the trigger area
Adjust the height of the trigger area
Change the position of the dashboard switches
Enable notification panel header weather display
Double tap navigation bar to put the device to sleep
Enable TCP/IP debugging over network interfaces (Wi-Fi, USB networks). This setting is reset on reboot

WARNING: When ADB over network is enabled, your phone is open for intrusions on all connected networks, including GSM data network!

Only use this feature when you are connected on trusted networks.

Do you really want to enable this function?
Multiple activities on screen at the same time.

WARNING: This is a highly experimental feature that allows multiple activities on-screen at the same time through the Recent apps UI. Some apps may crash or not function correctly when used with this feature.
Scramble PIN layout when unlocking device
Are you sure you want to reset these colors to default?
Blurs and displays the content behind your lockscreen
Enable to show AOSIP logo on the left side of statusbar
Choose which side to display the logo on, left or right
Show Logos in Statusbar from a wide range of icons available in System
Double tap status bar to put the device to sleep
Double tap on the top third or bottom shortcut area of the lock screen to put the device to sleep
View or change how the \'cLock\' Home widget will display
View or change how the clock of the \'cLock\' Home widget will display
View or change how the weather of the \'cLock\' Home widget will display
View or change how the calendar of the \'cLock\' Home widget will display
Landscape keyboard will never take up entire screen
Force auto-rotate when keyboard is shown
Disables auto-rotate sensor %1$s seconds after keyboard is hidden
This feature forces auto-rotate to turn on temporarily while the keyboard is shown. It has no effect when auto-rotate is already enabled.
Force keyboard to show enter instead of emoticon key
Disables quick settings in the keyguard for a secure lock only
Unlock automatically when the correct PIN/password is entered
Disables quick settings on secure lockscreen
Show Charging Current rate on lock screen
Use OmniSwitch instead of default recents view
Make sure you have enabled OmniSwitch. You can do this by using \"Settings\" below
Enable orange status and navigation bars when battery saver is activated
Enable to show the music visualizer on the lock screen
Enable to use a custom color, disable to create the color from the lock screen background automatically
Show battery saver notification when enabled
Show low battery notification when enabled
Plays sound effect when screenshot is taken
Enable notificiation for when the flashlight is on
Disabling the camera shutter sound is illegal in some areas! Please check the applicable law in your country
An error occurred.\n\nPlease check for root access. To activate go into superuser settings and enable root access.
Changing your default LCD density can sometimes cause certain apps to not function properly and/or the playstore to show apps being incompatible with your device
Tablets generally use 160 dpi while high end devices use 320 or 480 dpi. Older devices use 240 dpi
You need to reboot your device for your change to take effect
Changing your default LCD density can sometimes cause certain apps to not function properly and/or the playstore to show apps being incompatible with your device"
Scrolling cache may improve scrolling performance at the cost of memory
This will hide all force close notificaitons
This tool allows you to delete system apps. Use with caution and only delete apps you know are safe to be removed.
Are you sure you want to delete this app?
Blocking wakelocks have the potential to cause instability, crashes or data loss
SELinux is a set of kernel modifications and user-space tools. Changing modes can cause unwanted effects. Use at your own risk.
Do not reduce media playback volume when a notification arrives
Longpress power button with screen off turns on torch
WARNING\u003A this disables a security check to prevent possible tapjacking! Use only if you understand the consequences.
Halo will appear for incoming tasks and scroll out of sight after a while
When opening an app with Halo the underlying app will get paused
Show message box for incoming notifications
Halo will ping when device is unlocked if new notifications were received
Enable Halo button in statusbar header
Defines how big Halo is going to be
Halo message box animation for incoming notifications
Defines what color the Halo bubble is
Let this app show notifications in HALO
Blur the background when you pull down the status bar
Set the background of notifications translucent
Blur the background of status bar header
Blur the background of expanded status bar
